entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn reports false errors for interceptors for conditional invocations #70243
  • Collection expressions: handle use site diagnostics and other complex cases when using well-known members #70241
    17.9
  • The call is ambiguous when using collections literals with interpolated strings #70238
    17.9
  • Intellisence ignores protected accessibility for constructor in derived classes #70235
    Backlog
  • macOS tests are crashing regularly #70233
  • `AbstractChangeImplementationCodeRefactoringProvider` crashes with `InvalidOperationException` calling LINQ's `First` #70232

Closed

  • "The call is ambiguous" error when using collection expressions on an overloaded method #70236
  • Test plan for "Primary Constructors" feature #65697
    17.8
  • Const pattern mathing with null weird behaviour #70234

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid infinite cycle caused by an early binding of DefaultParameterValue attribute. #70242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Load solutions out-of-proc #70240
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix checksum hierarchy #70239
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix GetDocumentationComment returns unresolved doc reference for inheritdoc typeparamref #70230
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • SG work (warmup compilation) #70227
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Use stronger typing wrt to checksums and checksum trees #70237
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2283054 #70228
  • Add O# EA accessor for DocumentId.CreateFromSerialized #70229
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Create and cache a singleton directive parser inside the lexer #70223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70231
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve checksum perf #70220
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2281126 #70204

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70244
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Collection expressions: optimize List<T> construction #70197
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Collection expressions: ImmutableArray optimization #70222
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: analyze nullability of element assignments #70192
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix VB features impacted by IOperation change #70191
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • fix missing space for numeric token #70135 #70202
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle caused by calculation of ObsoleteState/ExperimentalState. #70171
    Area-Compilers, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: update rules for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: update better conversion from expression rule #70158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable LSP pull diagnostics from Run Code Analysis command #70186
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • PR for testing purposes #70174
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include implicit MyBase.New() call in IBlockOperation for VB Constructors #69873
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <constant>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<constant>)` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Synthesized members #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
